CustomField.formula: TEXT( FLOOR( (If(Complete__c, LastModifiedDate, Now()) - CreatedDate) ) ) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (If(Complete__c, LastModifiedDate, Now()) - CreatedDate) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (If(Complete__c, LastModifiedDate, Now()) - CreatedDate) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula to show readable duration in: Days, Hours and Minutes
CustomField.label: Event Duration
